name: Hilmar Petursson
description: Hilmar Veigar Pétursson has led CCP Games as CEO since 2004, advocating for virtual worlds to foster social connections. Under his leadership, CCP’s EVE Online pioneered player-driven economies and community governance, celebrating over 20 years of success. Previously CCP’s CTO from 2000-2005, Hilmar has received industry honors and influenced digital economies. He also serves on several technology boards and holds a B.Sc. in Computer Science from the University of Iceland.
